name: Dr Angela Beesley
professional_profile: Engineering leader with transformational and servant-leadership style, spanning aerospace, scientific instrumentation, machine learning, high‑throughput systems, and global R&D leadership.

career_history.summary: Lead global R&D strategy, define system architectures, drive cross-site engineering culture, lead Ex/ATEX/IECEx certifications, manage risk and quality, contribute to AOP and long-term roadmaps.
Led LC/MS IVD system architecture, cybersecurity strategy, China certification alignment, risk management, and requirements frameworks.
Managed flight-critical actuator programmes, led cross-disciplinary teams, delivered certification artefacts, improved QMS processes.
Designed and modelled flight-critical EMAs under DO-178C; led controls integration and stability solutions.
Developed optimisation algorithms, QSAR models, and high-throughput formulation platforms; recognised authority in modelling.
Built high-throughput solid-dispersion screening and MATLAB PCA/clustering tools.
Developed microreactor XAS systems and automated EXAFS for high-throughput catalysis research.

education: PhD Physics – University of Liverpool (ORS Award) (2001–2005)
affiliations: EU Expert Reviewer & Rapporteur – Horizon Europe
